issue.title: [Python] JS version number is sometimes picked up
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2230](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2230). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Depending on the installed git version, command line arguments are parsed differently. Thus in some cases we pick up the non-JS tag, in other cases simply the latest one.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2230?focusedCommentId=16380839) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 1676
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/1676>
